channel.title: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"
channel.description:
Guy named Gordon freeman in australia has got an pressent from gabe... and something with a 3 in it
![](upload://4z5G2IZt5wOwviENunvdlKHFy6w.png)
[img]https://cache.kotaku.com/assets/images/9/2012/02/bigpic_2d74108d69ecc5db9d4b66d8730e62f4.jpg[/img]
![](upload://vZsDWzrBeAqwEyFRxkKF3kBPdCR.png)
[i]update:[/i] ![](upload://2kyhN0ehJvSK79BAVJVml7ADGk7.jpeg)
His Twitter: [url]https://twitter.com/#!/Resistian/status/166368712713183233/photo/1[/url]

item.title: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"
item.dc:creator: Fnork
item.description:
DrKlowner:

male son

Sorcery!

Also necromancy!

Read full topic

item.title: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"

item.description:
Gordon Freeman will me my male son’s name. Chell [REDACTED] will be my daughter’s name.

item.title: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"
item.dc:creator: Rebel
item.description:
Wow, if I ever met that guy, I’d tell him that the Combine has turned the streets over to striders this close to the citadel, but there’s a crate of rockets somewhere out there, and I think we can punch through to the citadel wall.

Not sure how the hell we’re gonna breach it, but I’m sure he’ll think of something.

Read full topic
item.source: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"

item.description:
he said shirt was fake, photoshoped, other stuff is real

item.title: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"
item.dc:creator: _LOS_Kojak
item.description:
sersoft:

I would attempt to teleport him out of my lab but the teleport would probably fail due to his notoriously bad luck.

I really like you post, in special Notoriously Bad Luck part.

item.title: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
Kaweebo:

Regardless if this is real or not, I bet there really is someone out there named Gordon Freeman.

https://names.whitepages.com/gordon/freeman

And I’m sure there are lots more all around the world.

item.title: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"

item.description:
that shirt could be legit. there was a valve employee at E3 last year who was wearing the same one. i cant remember where i sore the picture though.

on another note that dude has some serious disco carpet.

item.title: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"
item.dc:creator: pendulum
item.description:
Dias:

So “Valve” gives him a physical copy of an Xbox game, then a steam copy of a non-existent game? Sounds both legit & consistent.

he is giving away half-life games so i guess it was just a half-life 2 pack or orange box.

Read full topic
item.source: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"

item.title: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
BahamutBBob:

He didn’t mention there was a Steam key(!) printed on the tag.

So “Valve” gives him a physical copy of an Xbox game, then a steam copy of a non-existent game? Sounds both legit & consistent.

item.title: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"
item.dc:creator: ChancyWancy
item.description:
Despite any speculation that may/may not begin and all of that stuff, it would be something else to walk around with that T-Shirt knowing you’re the only one of the only people who has it.

Edit: Oh piss! He got the 360 version. Way to look out for the mascot, Valve.

Read full topic
item.source: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"

item.title: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
mankyman6:

The shirt could just be a little joke. I don’t believe it would be past Valve’s humor.

It’s not like they actually gave him Half Life 3.

He didn’t mention there was a Steam key(!) printed on the tag.

Read full topic
item.source: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"

item.title: What You Get When You’re Named "Gordon Freeman"
item.dc:creator: OrderOfDagon
item.description:
I’d throw a can on the ground and tell him to pick it the fuck up…
Pending on whether he does it or not, I would give him a printed piece of cardboard with an Achievement on it.
